trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around July 10th 1997
Summary: I saw a chrome sphere sort of sticking out of the clouds and then it closed up like an eye forming a black line and than the line shrank tell it disapeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from work to Liberty ,Mo. on highway 435 from Kansas City, aproximately 3:30 - 4:00 when I saw a large sphere in the sky up against the clouds almost as if it where part of a lager craft that was hiden inside the clouds. I got the impression that it was sort of like an eye spying on people, because the way it closed up was like an eye closing and then it formed a thick black line that shrank in lenth untill it was gone. I've only told close family members about this, because my wife was afraid everyone would think I was crazy, but I don't care I want to know if anyone else has seen anything like this. I'll never forget.
